doc.title: Dante's Inferno Animated
doc.plot: Dante's Inferno Animated is a short animation film that tells Dante Alighieri's journey through the first part of the afterlife, Inferno. It is a compelling four-quadrant film organized circle by circle and narrated in primitive Italian in Dante's own words. Dante is guided by his hero Virgil through each circle of Hell and their subdivisions until they reach the center of the Earth and emerged to the other hemisphere into Purgatory. It features over 50 original color illustrations from the upcoming Dante's Inferno comic book and magazine series, put together in a series of animation clips that will delight a young audience.
